Cookie Processing Policy

Visiting the site https://news.dybka.ru on the Internet, you agree to this policy, including that https://news.dybka.ru maybe use cookies and other data for their subsequent processing by Google Analytics, Yandex.Metrica and others, and may also transfer them to third parties for research, work or services.

What are cookies

Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (personal computer, laptop, tablet, mobile phone, etc.) when you visit sites on the Internet.

In addition, when visiting the site https://news.dybka.ru other data is automatically collected on the Internet, including: technical characteristics of the device, IP address, information about the browser and language used, date and time of access to the site, the addresses of the requested pages of the site and other similar information.

What types of cookies are used

Depending on the browser and device you use, different sets of cookies are used, including strictly necessary, operational, functional and analytical cookies.

What cookies can be used for

When you visit the site https://news.dybka.ru on the Internet, cookies can be used for:

  • ensuring the functioning and security of the site;
  • improving the quality of the site;
  • registration in the self-service system (personal account);
  • providing you with information about https://news.dybka.ru , its products and services;
  • to improve products and/or services and to develop new products and/or services.

Other information collected can be used to generate your "list of interests", consisting of random ID, category of interest and timestamp for showing you internet content and advertisements, relevant to your interests.

How to manage cookies

The browser and/or device you use may allow you to block, delete, or otherwise restrict use of cookies. But cookies are an important part of the site https://news.dybka.ru on the Internet, so blocking, deleting or restricting their use may lead to the fact that you will not have access to all the functions of the site.

To learn how to manage cookies using the browser or device you use, you can use the instructions provided by the browser developer or the device manufacturer.
